div.div: We have classes, athletic teams, extracurricular activities, and many other opportunities which meet the needs, and interests, of ALL students.
BCPS has STEM and STEAM in-school and after-school programs partnering with community agencies and our middle schools
BCPS strives to provide students with opportunities in the arts which allow them to reach their full potential as performers and individuals.
Our schools use the latest hardware and software to give students opportunities to use technology first hand with robotics and technology-rich activities in the classroom and out.
Our athletic teams are made up of the best student-athletes in the area. We have both male and female teams at the middle and high schools and many have won district and state championships.

div.h2: Welcome to Bay City Public Schools

div.p: The Bay City Public Schools is the best choice in education in Bay County. Our highly trained staff provides rigorous instruction and curriculum to students preparing them for their futures; be it college, trade school, military, or the workforce. Our numerous options for academic, athletic, and extracurricular activities and events allows students and families to select what best fits their needs. We have a large school district that provides more opportunities than any other district in Bay County; however, we also provide an innovative, family-like environment for our students.

Here you will receive the BEST education, tools for growth, and the opportunity to participate in a near-endless number of academic, athletic and extracurricular activities and events. We have exceptional opportunities for all!
